rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with wide door for wheelchair accessibility and floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural lighting.
A large living room featuring a traditional Kerala wooden door and an open design with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the courtyard.
A dining area adjoining the living room; designed with accessible counters and open layout, incorporating traditional motifs.
A fully functional kitchen with wheelchair accessibility in mind, featuring ample storage and easy-to-reach counters. Traditional Kerala style with tiled flooring.
Master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and wide door for easy access; located in a Vastu-aligned position.
Second bedroom, designed with accessibility features and traditional Kerala design elements.
Third bedroom offering a peaceful retreat; incorporates local motifs and is designed for ease of mobility.
Fourth bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort with accessible design features.
Home theater area featuring comfortable seating arranged in an arc for optimal viewing, equipped with integrated audio-visual technology and accessible design.
Accessible bathroom designed with grab rails, non-slip flooring and sufficient turning radius for wheelchair users; includes traditional Kerala-style fixtures.

openings.description: Main entrance door with wheelchair ramp and automatic opening system to adhere to accessibility norms.
Floor-to-ceiling windows integrated into living room and master bedroom for enhanced natural lighting while following Vastu principles.
Central courtyard serving as a ventilated space with a water feature for enhanced aesthetics and natural cooling.

additional_features.description: All critical pathways and common areas are designed with smooth flooring, ramps, and accessible doorways to ensure compliance with wheelchair accessibility standards.
Incorporates local architectural elements such as tiled roofs, wooden doors, and courtyard-centered layout in line with Traditional Kerala-style Nalukettu.
